campusNavigation.title: International Students Office
campusNavigation.description:
Located at Faculty of Communications 2nd Floor. Handles all matters regarding international students including registration, accounting, graduation and student permits. Working hours: Monday to Friday 8am to 5pm, closed during holidays.

<iframe src="https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m14!1m12!1m3!1d373.8168140044392!2d33.325172741683765!3d35.22408728250506!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!5e1!3m2!1sen!2s!4v1761907354063!5m2!1sen!2s" width="600" height="450" style="border:0;" allowfullscreen="" loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade"></iframe>

campusNavigation.title: Grand Library
campusNavigation.description:
Near East University Grand Library is open Monday to Friday from 8am to 8pm. The library provides study spaces, resources, and academic materials for students.

<iframe src="https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m18!1m12!1m3!1d652.1944348698642!2d33.32683836385826!3d35.22480021104133!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x14de113d99e4c681%3A0x226adf08639790c9!2sNear%20East%20University%20Grand%20Library!5e1!3m2!1sen!2s!4v1761906914643!5m2!1sen!2s" width="600" height="450" style="border:0;" allowfullscreen="" loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade"></iframe>

campusNavigation.title: Student Deanship Office
campusNavigation.description:
Located at Ataturk Culture and Congress Center. The Dean of Students Office provides services, programs, and various opportunities to students. Contact: neuogrenci.dekanligi@neu.edu.tr, Phone: +90 (392) 223 64 64

<iframe src="https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m14!1m8!1m3!1d1536.7807034744471!2d33.32631697304336!3d35.22747736824614!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x14de113df8d5b0eb%3A0x2362358e74af69e4!2sAtaturk%20Culture%20and%20Congress%20Center!5e1!3m2!1sen!2s!4v1761907984037!5m2!1sen!2s" width="600" height="450" style="border:0;" allowfullscreen="" loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade"></iframe>

campusNavigation.title: Post Office
campusNavigation.description:
NEU Post Office branch located at Faculty of Administrative and Economics Sciences Ground Floor. Provides postal and mailing services to students and staff.

<iframe src="https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m14!1m8!1m3!1d407.40445762135255!2d33.3258355!3d35.2255032!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x14de11783e6dff3d%3A0xbd807d589cc0b53d!2zxLBrdGlzYXQ!5e0!3m2!1sen!2s!4v1761116558953!5m2!1sen!2s" width="600" height="450" style="border:0;" allowfullscreen="" loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade"></iframe>

campusNavigation.title: Dormitories
campusNavigation.description:
NEU has 12 dormitories on campus (Dormitory 1-12) plus a Guest House. All dormitories are located within the campus area and provide accommodation for students. Dormitory 1 location:

campusNavigation.description:

admissions.title: Application Process
admissions.description: Students can apply online at https://aday.neu.edu.tr. The application system is available for all prospective students.

admissions.title: Accepted Certificates - International Exams
admissions.description: NEU accepts: GCSE, IGCSE, International Baccalaureate, ACT, SAT, and various international high school diplomas. All documents in languages other than English or Turkish require official translation.

admissions.title: Accepted Certificates - Regional Exams
admissions.description: NEU accepts: Tawjihi (Jordan/Palestine), Baccalaureate (Lebanon/Iraq/Syria), Diploma Debirestan (Iran), Higher Secondary Certificate (Pakistan/India/Bangladesh), WAEC/NECO (Nigeria), GAOKAO (China), and other High School Diplomas.

admissions.title: Student Residence Permit
admissions.description: International students must register for residence permit at https://permissions.gov.ct.tr/login. The International Students Office assists with this process.

admissions.title: Tuition Fees 2025-2026
admissions.description: Full list of programs and tuition fees available at https://aday.neu.edu.tr. Fees vary by program and faculty.

admissions.title: Document Translation
admissions.description: All documents submitted in languages other than English or Turkish must have an official translation.

admissions.title: Freezing Registration
admissions.description: Students can freeze their registration under certain circumstances. More information available at https://aday.neu.edu.tr/additional-information/freezing-registration/

courses.name: Faculty of Veterinary Medicine
courses.description: Offers veterinary medicine programs with departments including Basic Veterinary Sciences, Preclinical Sciences, Clinical Sciences, Zootechnics and Animal Nutrition, and Food Hygiene and Technology. Website: https://veterinary.neu.edu.tr/

courses.name: Faculty of Tourism
courses.description: Offers Tourism and Hotel Management programs (two years and undergraduate) and MSc in Tourism Management. Website: https://turizm.neu.edu.tr/

courses.name: Faculty of Theology
courses.description: Offers Islamic theology and religious studies programs. Website: https://ilahiyat.neu.edu.tr/

courses.name: Faculty of Sports Sciences
courses.description: Departments: Physical Education and Sport Teaching, Sports Management, Coaching Education, Recreation. Website: https://sporbilimleri.neu.edu.tr/

courses.name: Faculty of Pharmacy
courses.description: Comprehensive pharmacy education with departments in Pharmaceutical Basic Sciences, Pharmaceutical Sciences, and Pharmaceutical Technology. Includes specializations in Analytical Chemistry, Pharmacology, Pharmaceutical Technology, and more. Website: https://eczacilik.neu.edu.tr

courses.name: Faculty of Nursing
courses.description: Offers nursing education and training programs. Website: https://hemsirelik.neu.edu.tr

courses.name: Faculty of Medicine
courses.description: Medical education and training programs for aspiring doctors and healthcare professionals. Website: https://medicine.neu.edu.tr/

courses.name: Faculty of Law
courses.description: Departments: Law and International Law. Prepares students for legal careers. Website: https://hukuk.neu.edu.tr

courses.name: Faculty of Health Sciences
courses.description: Departments: Audiology, Nutrition and Dietetics, Physiotherapy and Rehabilitation. Website: https://saglikbilimleri.neu.edu.tr/

courses.name: Faculty of Fine Arts and Design
courses.description: Departments: Graphic Design, Plastic Arts, Graphic Design Vocational School. Website: https://guzelsanatlar.neu.edu.tr/

courses.name: Faculty of Engineering
courses.description: Departments include: Industrial Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Biomedical Engineering, Automotive Engineering, BioEngineering, Mechatronics Engineering, Electrical and Electronic Engineering, Materials Science and Nanotechnology Engineering, Petroleum and Natural Gas Engineering. Website: https://muhendislik.neu.edu.tr/

courses.name: Atatürk Faculty of Education
courses.description: Comprehensive education programs including Music Education, Social Sciences Teaching, Science Teaching, Pre-school Teaching, English Language Teaching, Classroom Teaching, Mathematics Teaching, Psychological Counselling and Guidance, and many more. Website: https://egitim.neu.edu.tr

courses.name: Faculty of Economics and Administrative Sciences
courses.description: Departments: European Union Relations, Banking and Accounting, Banking and Finance, Economics, Human Resource Management, Business Administration, Marketing, Public Administration, Political Science, International Relations, International Business. Website: https://iktisat.neu.edu.tr/

courses.name: Faculty of Dentistry
courses.description: Departments: Prosthodontics, Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery, Restorative Dentistry, Endodontics, Orthodontics, Pedodontics, Periodontology, Oral and Maxillofacial Radiology. Website: https://dentistry.neu.edu.tr

courses.name: Faculty of Communication
courses.description: Departments: Cartoon and Animation, Filmmaking and Broadcasting, Journalism, Visual Communication Design, Public Relations and Publicity, Radio, Television and Cinema. Website: https://iletisim.neu.edu.tr/

courses.name: Faculty of Civil and Environmental Engineering
courses.description: Departments: Civil Engineering, Environmental Engineering, Traffic and Transportation Engineering, Construction Technology, Construction and Technical Drawing Technologies. Website: https://insaatvecevre.neu.edu.tr/

courses.name: Faculty of Arts and Sciences
courses.description: Departments: Molecular Biology and Genetics, English Language and Literature, Mathematics, Turkish Language and Literature, Psychology, Translation and Interpretation, Geography, Physics. Website: https://fenedebiyat.neu.edu.tr/

courses.name: Faculty of Architecture
courses.description: Departments: Architecture and Interior Architecture. Website: https://mimarlik.neu.edu.tr/

courses.name: Faculty of Artificial Intelligence and Informatics
courses.description: Departments: Artificial Intelligence Engineering, Computer Engineering, Information Systems Engineering, Cyber Security Engineering, Management Information Systems, Computer Information Systems, Data Analytics Engineering, Software Engineering. Website: https://aif.neu.edu.tr/

courses.name: Faculty of Agriculture
courses.description: Departments: Landscape Architecture and Food Engineering. Website: https://ziraat.neu.edu.tr/

generalInfo.title: University Contact Information
generalInfo.description: Phone: +90 (392) 223 64 64 or +90 (392) 680 20 00. Email: info@neu.edu.tr. WhatsApp: +90 548 818 0818. Extension: 5143. Address: Near East Boulevard, 99138 Nicosia / TRNC, Mersin 10 – TURKEY. Website: https://neu.edu.tr

generalInfo.title: Student Petitions System
generalInfo.description: Students can submit petitions regarding refunds, academic matters, job applications, dormitory matters, and financial matters through the online petition system. Email: petitions@neu.edu.tr

generalInfo.title: Psychological Counseling Services
generalInfo.description: NEU provides psychological counseling services through the Psychological Counseling, Guidance, and Research Center. Contact: pdram@neu.edu.tr or through the Dean of Students' Office for appointments and support.

generalInfo.title: Student Activities Center
generalInfo.description: Helps organize events, directs students to clubs and societies, and represents students in domestic and international events. Contact: yduodkulupleri@neu.edu.tr

generalInfo.title: Career Planning Services
generalInfo.description: The Career Planning Unit under the Dean of Students Office provides career counseling, job preparation, and professional development support for students.

generalInfo.title: Disability Support Services
generalInfo.description: The Disabled Students Unit provides accommodations and support services for students with disabilities. Contact through the Dean of Students Office.

generalInfo.title: Academic Calendar and Handbook
generalInfo.description: 2025-2026 academic calendar available at https://neu.edu.tr/academic/academic-calendar. University handbook available at https://online.fliphtml5.com/mabep/cfjs/#p=37

generalInfo.title: Alumni Services
generalInfo.description: NEU Alumni Unit maintains connections with graduates and provides networking opportunities and continued support after graduation.
